statements: SELECT * FROM donors
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donor_name, contact_info FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_date >= '2022-07-01'
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donor_name ASC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donors GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donation_amount > 5000
SELECT donation_date, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, contact_info FROM donors WHERE contact_info IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_category FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_date, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors WHERE donor_category = 'Individual';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT donor_name, donor_category, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_category = 'Corporate';
SELECT communication_type, communication_date, communication_content FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, communication_date FROM donors INNER JOIN communications ON donors.donor_id = communications.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM donors;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communication ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM donors ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, c.communication_date FROM donors d JOIN communication c ON d.donor_id = c.donor_id WHERE c.communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY c.communication_date ASC;

SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, COALESCE(SUM(don.donation_amount), 0) AS total_donation FROM donors d LEFT JOIN donations don ON d.donor_id = don.donor_id GROUP BY d.first_name, d.last_name ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, don.donation_date FROM donors d JOIN donations don ON d.donor_id = don.donor_id WHERE don.donation_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY don.donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 2;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_date >= '2023-01-01';

SELECT donor_name, campaign_name, communication_date FROM donors JOIN communications ON donors.donor_id = communications.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON communications.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donation > 1000;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.amount, donations.donation_date FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, campaign_name FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON donations.amount < 500;

SELECT donor_id, donor_name, campaign_name, communication_date FROM donors JOIN communication ON donors.donor_id = communication.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON communication.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
